editorialNotes.standard: With its compelling lineup of TV shows, movies, and original content, Hulu delivers a massive entertainment catalog directly to any device. With your subscription, watch episodes of The Handmaid’s Tale, Four Weddings and a Funeral, How I Met Your Father, Shrill, and more.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: If you ever see a group of teenagers (or twenty- or thirtysomethings) filming themselves doing literally anything, know this: They’re probably making a video to share on TikTok. Its infinite scroll of new videos combines perfectly edited lip-synching, hilarious sketches, and mesmerizing dance moves with delightful special effects and filters. It’s hard not to fall in love with everyone’s fluffy pets, awkward parents, impressive glow-ups, fails of every kind, and songs and pop-culture references that spark a million memes.
editorialNotes.short: Make awesome short music videos that you can share with the world.
This perfect shopping app for that look that you won't find in any mall.
Create videos with ease and express your style with stickers.

editorialNotes.standard: If you need it, DoorDash can deliver it. The app brings not just a world of local restaurants to your living room but also groceries, flowers, pet supplies, and more. Search by cuisine or distance, or visit the Try Something New section to discover new flavors in your town.
editorialNotes.short: Enjoy your favorite cuisine anytime

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Whether you’re looking for the latest can’t-miss dramas, comedies, or reality hits, Max has something for everyone. Watch HBO Original series like Succession, The Last of Us, The White Lotus, and Love & Death. Revisit classics like Friends, South Park, and The Big Bang Theory. And enjoy unscripted treats from Discovery like Fixer Upper, MythBusters, Dr. Pimple Popper, Deadliest Catch, and Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.tagline: Butcher wages war on the Supes
editorialNotes.standard: Convinced you’ve run out of things to watch? Amazon Prime Video may be able to prove otherwise. The app is brimming with brilliant films, dramas, and comedies, as well as sports and children’s TV, all available to watch on demand. We love the ultra-high-quality 4K streaming and the slick UI. Oh, and the ability to create multiple user profiles and download series to watch later. There are also hundreds of Amazon Originals to check out—great series and films produced by Amazon Studios that you won’t find anywhere else.
editorialNotes.short: Prime entertainment whenever you want.
Create a profile and search through millions of job listings.

Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.short: Watch videos without ads with Premium. Try it free for one month.

editorialNotes.standard: You need toothpaste, golf clubs, and batteries—and you need them now. Known for its colossal shopping catalog, Amazon packs virtually all of the features and functions found on its website into this ample app, whether you’re buying gifts, tracking orders, or scanning items in a brick-and-mortar store for an online price comparison. It’s easy to navigate, intuitive, and extremely fast.
editorialNotes.short: Size up your next couch with AR product stickers

Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: There are a hundred different ways to share things with your friends, but Discord stands out as a particularly good one. You can create individual groups (called servers) for your friends: the group that you play videogames with, the group that goes to the cinema together, and so on. This app first made its name among videogame players, but these days, Discord is used by everyone, in no small part because it’s easy to understand, quick to set up, and slick to use.
editorialNotes.short: A social network for gamers to chat in real time.
Book your ride and know exactly how much it’ll cost.

editorialNotes.standard: Airbnb has totally changed the way we find places to stay. The unique service is packed with amazing spots all around the world—from cottages in France to New York City condos. Book private rooms, share homes with a host, or list your own space. This full-featured app boasts thousands of rent-ready pads, intuitive filters, and a beautiful design.
editorialNotes.short: Book a place to stay for your dream get-away.

editorialNotes.standard: Walmart’s app lets you browse thousands of products, search for items that have recently gone on sale and even refill your prescriptions. But the savings catcher is pure genius: scan a receipt for any purchase made in the last seven days, and if a competitor in your area is advertising a lower price, Walmart automatically gives you the difference. It’s a fantastic, hassle-free way to save money without the need to shop around.
editorialNotes.short: Shop groceries and millions of other items

editorialNotes.standard: We love that Cash App freed us from personal checks and IOUs. But we get really excited about Boosts: instant discounts when using your Cash Card. No matter if you swipe your physical Cash Card or tap to pay with Apple Pay, Boosts give you coupon-like perks just for spending money at restaurants, coffee shops, and popular stores.
editorialNotes.short: Easily buy stocks and crypto, track their performance, and cash out in this trusted app.

editorialNotes.standard: We love finding and pinning creative ideas, tasty recipes, and more. Pinterest’s wonderfully designed app is a constant source of inspiration, whether you’re planning a trip, remodeling your home, or finding something to wear. With a bevy of helpful features—from collaborative boards to built-in messaging—Pinterest is an exceptionally visual way to explore what matters to you.
editorialNotes.short: Get creative with your holiday decor.

editorialNotes.standard: With its friendly approach and awesome updates, Duolingo’s long been one of our favorite apps for learning another language. Its secret: making the process genuinely fun. Engaging mini-games test your reading, writing, and speaking skills, and joining a club (where you can encourage and compete with others) adds a great social element. Bonus: all those languages and games are available for free!
editorialNotes.short: Learn a new language. Join a club, chat with bots, and get reminders to practice.

editorialNotes.standard: Before Canva came along, you had to invest in some pretty serious software (and have some pretty serious skills) to create even simple graphics. But with tens of thousands of templates and nearly unlimited ways to customize them, Canva has democratized design. With this easy-to-use app, you can master logos, posters, and invitations in minutes, not months.
editorialNotes.short: Quickly create posts for social media or your small business.
Skip the card or bank details when you shop online.
editorialNotes.tagline: The smarter way to pay online

editorialNotes.standard: With a dizzying amount of content, Disney+ eloquently presents its massive catalog from Disney, Pixar, Marvel, Star Wars, and National Geographic for users to stream with wild abandon. And using GroupWatch, you and your friends can watch shows and movies synced in real-time—no matter where you are around the globe.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.short: Big 11.11 deals on China's largest direct-buying portal.
Uncover the good and bad about your favorite foods and beauty products.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Fans of critically acclaimed CBS series like The Good Fight, NCIS, The Stand, and The Late Show With Stephen Colbert will love Paramount+. Sports fans can stream the NCAA tournament, the UEFA Champions League, the NFL on CBS, and the Masters. Newshounds can tune in to 60 Minutes and CBS Evening News. Star Trek series past, present, and future are establishing their home base here too. And there’s loads to watch with kids, including Dora the Explorer, Paw Patrol, Blue’s Clues, and the best of Nickelodeon’s streaming catalog.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: From its humble origin as a fun way to send self-erasing photo messages, Snapchat has grown into one of our favorite social media apps. And not just for the hilarious face filters and cool geographical photo tags. It’s become one of the best ways to share memories, maintain friendships, and stay up to date on news and views from our go-to websites.
editorialNotes.short: Share the moment.

editorialNotes.tagline: Add widgets to your Home Screen
editorialNotes.standard: Whether you love movies, kittens, science, kittens, politics, or kittens, Reddit’s official app puts all this (plus kittens) at your fingertips. With a colorful and intuitive layout, it’s easy to browse and post to “the front page of the internet” across thousands of subreddits that cater to virtually every area of interest. Search for communities that line up with your hobbies; filter posts by posting time, hotness, and more; and get a breakdown of your own Redditing history to see where you reaped all that sweet, sweet karma. (Pro tip: You can’t go wrong with pictures of—you guessed it—kittens.)
editorialNotes.short: Discover communities and topics.

editorialNotes.standard: We love watching live streams of League of Legends, Roblox and everything in between. And there’s more to Twitch than games. The Travel and Outdoors category (you’ll find it in the Browse tab) has live animal cams. There’s even an entire channel dedicated to painter and teacher (and master of happy little trees) Bob Ross.
editorialNotes.short: Broadcast, watch, chat and have fun.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Peacock TV is for serious TV fans. It has plenty of familiar titles: The Office, 30 Rock, Parks and Recreation, Saturday Night Live, Downton Abbey, Two and a Half Men, Yellowstone, The King of Queens, and Law & Order: SVU, to name a few. You’ll also find new episodes of The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon and kids’ shows like Curious George, as well as live coverage of Premier League soccer. Looking for wrestling? Peacock is now the home of the WWE’s new events and its giant streaming library.

editorialNotes.short: Eat what you like, when you like.

editorialNotes.standard: Zillow can help you find the home of your dreams—one that contains all of your must-haves, is a reasonable distance from work, and falls (kind of) within your budget. The app offers resources for every step in the process, from attending open houses to picking an agent to understanding the intricacies of the mortgage market.

This planetarium in your pocket makes it easy to discover the wonders of space wherever you go. Day or night, just aim your device skyward to see a live 3D map of the heavens, complete with beautifully illustrated constellations, stars, planets, and satellites. A special night mode helps you read the map in the dark, while integrated weather reports show the best times for stargazing. You can even have notifications alert you to future astronomical events.
editorialNotes.short: Experience the universe in AR

editorialNotes.tagline: Live games from the top leagues

editorialNotes.standard: It’s hard to remember now, but there was a time, in the not-too-distant past, when people didn’t utter the phrase “go on mute” every single day. That’s just one of the ways Zoom has changed the landscape/society/fabric of space-time; what started as a videoconferencing app for business has become our go-to way (and word) for connecting with people in other places. Zoom’s meteoric rise came due to timing and circumstance, sure, but the app has met its moment with an elegant design, reliable performance, and constantly evolving features. But in the end, its real meaning is bigger: Zoom keeps us connected with each other.
editorialNotes.short: Stay connected with screen sharing and recording features for video calls.

editorialNotes.standard: Maintaining healthy habits feels a bit less daunting with a customizable self-care pet at your fingertips. With Finch, your very own companion helps you move through specific goals and guided self-care journeys. Beyond that, you can set goals, reflect, or savor a moment of mindfulness with a library of exercises and soundscapes. With consistency, you’ll uncover more about your virtual pet’s personality—and the app’s robust insights can also help you learn a lot about you and your needs too.
